arStrings.szText: While channeling {c_important}Incinerate{/c}, you Burn enemies around you for {c_number}[{SF_29} * 100|%|]{/c} of the damage per second.
Enemies deal {c_number}[{SF_28} * 100|%|]{/c} less damage while Burning from {c_important}Incinerate{/c}.
Every {c_number}{SF_17}{/c} seconds an enemy has been hit by {c_important}Incinerate{/c}, they are Immobilized for {c_number}{SF_18}{/c} |4second.:seconds.
